text: Ifigenia in Tauride is an opera in three acts by Gian Francesco de Majo to a libretto by Mattia Verazi. It was commissioned by Elector Palatine Carl Theodor, and premiered in 1764. ==References== Category:Operas Category:1764 operas Category:Operas by Gian Francesco de Majo
title: Ifigenia in Tauride (Majo)
